com.cooking.FavouriteRecipe.controller

Class RecipeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cooking.FavouriteRecipe.controller.RecipeController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/rest/favouriteRecipe")
public class RecipeController
extends java.lang.Object
    The RecipeController handles the data to get, save, update and delete the recipe
